description.last_approved_text: Unlocks the time of day to run on its preset timer, allowing you to experience all of China's ambience!

time_of_day_modes.description: Unlocks the time of day to run on its preset timer, allowing you to experience all of China's ambience!
time_of_day_modes.name: Default

description.last_approved_text: Unlocks the time of day to run on its preset timer, allowing you to experience all of China's ambience! Faster passage of time than default.

time_of_day_modes.description: Unlocks the time of day to run on its preset timer, allowing you to experience all of China's ambience! Faster passage of time than default.
time_of_day_modes.name: Fast

description.last_approved_text: Unlocks the time of day to run on its preset timer, allowing you to experience all of China's ambience! Slower passage of time than default.

time_of_day_modes.description: Unlocks the time of day to run on its preset timer, allowing you to experience all of China's ambience! Slower passage of time than default.
time_of_day_modes.name: Slow

description.last_approved_text: Locks the time of day to morning, allowing you to experience China in the first rays of the rising sun!

time_of_day_modes.description: Locks the time of day to morning, allowing you to experience China in the first rays of the rising sun!
time_of_day_modes.name: Morning

description.last_approved_text: Locks the time of day to afternoon, allowing you to experience China at the height of the day!

time_of_day_modes.description: Locks the time of day to afternoon, allowing you to experience China at the height of the day!
time_of_day_modes.name: Day

description.last_approved_text: Locks the time of day to evening, allowing you to experience China during the evening sunset!

time_of_day_modes.description: Locks the time of day to evening, allowing you to experience China during the evening sunset!
time_of_day_modes.name: Evening

description.last_approved_text: Locks the time of day to midnight, allowing you to experience China beneath the ink of night!

time_of_day_modes.description: Locks the time of day to midnight, allowing you to experience China beneath the ink of night!
time_of_day_modes.name: Night

description.last_approved_text: Unlocks the time of day so that the world turns in real time to your system clock!

time_of_day_modes.description: Unlocks the time of day so that the world turns in real time to your system clock!
time_of_day_modes.name: Realtime
